title: Business card and flyer ad
snippet:
I am looking to get a theme set around my personal brand. I am the owner of 2 businesses and starting my consultant firm. I am interested in having a business card that list all the things i do without making it look cluttered. The design must be very unique and clean. 

I will also need a flyer design for my consultant business which will compliment the business cards. 

Depending on results I would want to hire you for more projects dealing with my businesses. 

Please simply submit your qualifications and samples of your work. 

Thank you I look forward to working with you.
